SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Sky High Cafe relative to The Golden Spoon?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Golden Spoon}.

VE.Q: What are the food safety index of The Golden Spoon, The Rusty Kettle, and Crimson Plate in 2002?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index is {82.50} index, The Rusty Kettle's food safety index is {112.27} index, Crimson Plate's food safety index is {112.81} index.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2004, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 2002 and 2003?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between 2002 and 2004 was {larger} than between 2002 and 2003.

NC.Q: Between 2001 and 2002, was the average total Food Safety Index higher or lower than between 2002 and 2004?
NC.A: The average total food safety index between 2001 and 2002 was {higher} than between 2002 and 2004.

NC.A: The average total food safety index between 2001 and 2004 was {higher} than between 2003 and 2004.

MSR.A: {The Cozy Nook} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {The Golden Spoon, Emerald Diner, The Rusty Kettle, Crimson Plate, Sky High Cafe, The Cozy Nook}.
